short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block websites with a minimal, easy-to-use interface

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block websites with a minimal, easy-to-use interface. Simply write a list of websites you want to block and you won't be able to access them in your browser. No subscriptions, no logins, no bells and whistles. Just a list of sites websites you want to block.
